narratives.question_text: How clearly did the instructor define the topic of study?
comments: Alan has an excellent command of the relevant material and was very eloquent when defining the topics of study.
Mr. Hendrickson is very clear about the course.
Alan had a clear syllabus for the class and followed it fairly closely.

narratives.question_text: How clearly did the instructor outline the expectation for the course, classroom activity and homework?
comments: He was very clear regarding his expectations for the course.
The definition wasn't particularly clear, but also not particularly important.

narratives.question_text: How well were individual class sessions prepared and presented?
comments: His powerpoints, handouts, and blackboard illustrations were very helpful.
The instructor always seemed to have everything he needed.
There were many classes where I felt two classes could have been compiled into one class period. The pace was often a little slow.

narratives.question_text: How well did lectures fit within the boundaries of the course?
comments: Some lectures seemed confusing as to whether or not they fell into the boundaries of physics or automation control, but on the whole, all of the lectures were interesting. I would've spent more time doing examples where students solve the problems instead of the instructor immediately providing the answer as he goes through.
Mr. Hendrickson's lectures are some of my favorite.
Sometimes lectures veered off but they were always full of useful information.
The workload was fair.
There could be one or two more.
I like the homework. It was great to see the numbers on paper and it was very helpful for the tests.
I wish if anything we did another problem set or two before the exam.
I wouldn't have minded more assignments. But that is just because that is how I process information the best.
Could have been more homework.

narratives.question_text: How available was the instructor for help outside the classroom?
comments: He was always willing to answer questions or to re-explain the topic.
He's easy to find.
Mr. Hendrickson is always very easy to find.
Alan is always available.

narratives.question_text: How useful were assignments in furthering an understanding of the topic?
comments: The assignments were perfectly in line with the course subject matter.

narratives.question_text: If tests were given, how fairly did they measure knowledge gained?
comments: The third (final) exam was especially difficult, but all exams were a good measure of knowledge gained.
The frequency of the tests were perfect in assessing the knowledge that was expected from the instructor.
A review guide is given out before each test and is very concise about the information given.

narratives.question_text: How useful was this course in preparing you for production work?
comments: This course has not yet influenced my production work.

narratives.question_text: How would you evaluate the instructor's knowledge of the material?
comments: Not only is the instructor knowledgeable, he has a great sense of humor.
He wrote the text book and comes up with new problems to work through for each class.

narratives.question_text: Please offer additional comments on such topics as: what worked best about the course, suggested improvements, class materials, etc.
comments: This course was excellent and did not add undue stress to my weekly schedule.
As always, Alan is a great teacher and doesn't hesitate to answer ridiculous hypothetical questions.
Alan is the absolute best.
Teaching more directly from the book would be a huge benefit to the course.
